me.stuartphillips.acr35

Class Main

  • java.lang.Object
    • CordovaPlugin
      • me.stuartphillips.acr35.Main

  • public class Main
extends CordovaPlugin
    This class allows control of the ACR35 reader sleep state and PICC commands

      • bytesToHex

        private java.lang.String bytesToHex(byte[] buffer)
        Converts raw data into a hexidecimal string
        Parameters:
        buffer: - raw data in the form of a byte array
        Returns:

      • maxVolume

        private boolean maxVolume()
        Checks if the device media volume is set to 100%
        Returns:
        true if media volume is at 100%

      • read

        private void read(CallbackContext callbackContext,
        int cardType)
        Sets the ACR35 reader to continuously poll for the presence of a card. If a card is found, the UID will be returned to the Apache Cordova application
        Parameters:
        callbackContext: - the callback context provided by Cordova
        cardType: - the integer representing card type

      • execute

        public boolean execute(java.lang.String action,
              JSONArray args,
              CallbackContext callbackContext)
                throws JSONException
        This method acts as the bridge between Cordova and native Android code. The Cordova application will invoke this method from JavaScript
        Parameters:
        action: - the command sent by the Cordova application
        args: - the command arguments sent by the Cordova application
        callbackContext: - the callback context provided by Cordova
        Returns:
        a boolean that notifies whether the command execution was successful
        Throws:
        JSONException
